column1: Secretary Naula [C.A/ PHC/41/2010] (C.A Minutes 31.01.2017) the scope of an inquiry
under section 9 of the State Lands (Recovery of Possession) Act is limited to;

column2: 1.  Occupying the land on a permit or a written authority.
It must be a valid permit or a written Authority.
It must be in force at the time of presenting it to Court.
It must be in force at the time of presenting it to Court.
It must have been issued in accordance with any Written Law.
